translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, that is Thomas Middleditch.
-That's Benjamin Schwartz. -We are Middleditch and Schwartz.
translation.de: -Das ist Benjamin Schwartz. -Wir sind Middleditch und Schwartz.

translation.en: Everything tonight will be made up on the spot.
translation.de: Wir denken uns alles spontan aus.

translation.en: Every character, every word, every sentence,
translation.de: Jede Figur, jedes Wort, jeden Satz,

translation.en: and we're very excited to bring it in a special form.
translation.de: wir freuen uns auf dieses Format.

translation.en: What we're going to do right now,
Thomas is going to ask the audience a question.
translation.de: stellt Thomas dem Publikum eine Frage.

translation.en: Please answer it in a real way, and we'll have a conversation.
translation.de: Antworten Sie normal. Wir unterhalten uns.

translation.en: We might ask a question or two.
Thomas, do you have a question for the audience?
Yeah, I do, I do, I do.
Uh...is there anything coming up in the near future
translation.de: Gibt es in der nahen Zukunft irgendwas,

translation.en: that you might either be excited about
or dreading in some kind of way?
Are you getting married to a man or woman?
translation.de: Heiraten Sie einen Mann oder eine Frau?

translation.en: You're in the wedding, but you...
-from the perspective of that. -That is interesting.
And they're right next to you?
So, you are in the wedding party for this.
Can you talk a little bit about the wedding itself?
They got the venue nailed down...
It's insane to me that you're explaining...
-This is how weddings should be explained. -Yeah.
Um, we all met each other,
like the group of friends that are in the wedding
all met each other at music festivals.
How long has this pod of pals been going on?
translation.de: Wie lange gibt es den Freundeskreis?

translation.en: That's a great year, though. It's a good year for making friends.
translation.de: Aber ein tolles Jahr für die Freundschaft.

translation.en: I have so many questions for the wedding couple.
Like, "What up with friends you grew up with?"
translation.de: Was ist mit euren alten Freunden?

translation.en: No, you fucking went to Burning Man once,
Only friends we met in a Walmart parking lot.
translation.de: Nur Freunde, die wir auf einem Walmart-Parkplatz kennenlernten.

translation.en: All your friends you met in a Walmart parking lot?
Can you give us... Tell us who's in that batch of friends
that you met in a Walmart parking lot.
He is a friend of a friend, who...
translation.de: Er ist der Freund eines Freundes...

translation.en: Do you not have friends of friends?
translation.de: Haben Sie keine Freunde von Freunden?

translation.en: But a friend of a friend to get bumped to the wedding party
translation.de: Aber ein Freund eines Freundes, der so in die Hochzeit eingebunden ist,

translation.en: -You've got to be a good dude. -That's a fast bond.
translation.de: -Du musst ein guter Kerl sein. -Das ging schnell.

translation.en: When I fall for a friend, I fall hard.
translation.de: Ich verliebe in einen Freund verliebe, dann richtig.

translation.en: Yeah, it's time you take over. Go.
-I want it from this guy, -I want to hear it too.
So, basically, they tried to ditch us,
and the only reason we found them
was because I happened to pull in to a supermarket parking lot--
translation.de: weil ich auf diesen Parkplatz fuhr.

translation.en: When they were trying to ditch you, you caught up to them.
translation.de: Sie haben sich nicht abhängen lassen.

translation.en: Yeah, so then there was an awkward moment real quick.
translation.de: Es gab kurz einen peinlichen Moment.

translation.en: -And now I'm in the wedding. -That's amazing.
translation.de: -Und jetzt bin ich bei der Hochzeit. -Das ist toll.

translation.en: Give us descriptions of who these people are. Like...
Another one is my, uh, college roommate's best friend from high school.
translation.de: Einer ist der beste Freund meines Uni-Mitbewohners.

translation.en: I like that as like an identifier of who that person is...
translation.de: Das ist eine gute Art, diese Person zu beschreiben.

translation.en: -I'm my college roommate's... -Who is that person?
Um, he was my boyfriend in sixth grade.
translation.de: Er war mein Freund in der sechsten Klasse.

translation.en: So, you went out with him.
-Not no more, girl. -In sixth grade, what was he like?
We all are in sixth grade.
translation.de: Wie alle in der sechsten Klasse.

translation.en: You were fucking short then, too.
So, when you're in the wedding party, sir,
translation.de: Wenn Sie in der Hochzeitsgesellschaft sind,

translation.en: I want to ask you, are you the best man?
Did you just find that out now?
No, no, that fucking thing right there.
-Whatever that is. -Tell us about that post in front of you.
translation.de: -Was auch immer das ist. -Die Säule vor Ihnen.

translation.en: She wasn't there. This is my girlfriend.
translation.de: Sie war nicht da. Das ist meine Freundin.

translation.en: She was invited, but she didn't want to go.
translation.de: Ja, aber sie wollte nicht hin.

translation.en: -This is going to be... -I told you that in confidence.
This is going to be on Netflix where everybody can watch it.
translation.de: Das wird bei Netflix geben, wo jeder es sehen kann.

translation.en: I know it feels like a normal one of our shows
translation.de: Es wirkt wie eine normale Show,

translation.en: where everybody tells their deepest, darkest secrets.
She wasn't invited to the festival.
That's what we were asking. Okay.
Anybody else in the group you'll talk about?
We have a friend who's a nurse.
sixth grade shorty ass, fucking, ex-boyfriend
translation.de: Dein kleiner Exfreund aus der sechsten Klasse

translation.en: is still around in your life?
-He's in the wedding party. -Yeah, he's my best friend.
translation.de: -In der Hochzeitsgesellschaft. -Er ist mein bester Freund.

translation.en: You all listen to live music.
Anything else you want to ask, or do we do an improv show now?
translation.de: Sonst noch was, oder fangen wir an?

translation.en: -Let's do an improv show. -Okay, ladies and gentlemen,
thank you very much. We appreciate all four of you guys.
translation.de: vielen Dank. Ihr vier seid super.

translation.en: So, for the rest of the show, nobody else has to talk.
translation.de: Für den Rest der Show muss also niemand mehr reden.

translation.en: Thank you all so much for being here.
Without further ado, we present to you Middleditch and Schwartz.
-Do you need anything? Do you think? -Huh?
-Do you need anything? -I'm good for now.
-Just making the rounds. -I'm good for now.
-This is awesome. -Thanks, man. I appreciate it.
I mean, I'd never do what you do.
I'd never do what you're doing. Sorry.
I wouldn't. But that's so cool, man. That's awesome.
translation.de: Ja. Aber das ist echt cool. Super.
Ich habe die richtige Wahl getroffen.

translation.en: Is everybody good? Is everybody here?
I think so, yeah. I'm just checking in with you.
translation.de: Ja. Ich schaue nur, wie es dir geht.

translation.en: -You know? -[exhales] They say you get nervous.
You get a little nervous right before.
-So, this is normal, what I'm feeling. -Of course.
-You're going to change your life. -Yeah, for the better.
Yeah. For me it would be worse.
Yeah. Give me another attribute about her.
Uh... I met her fou-- five years ago.
translation.de: Ich lernte sie vor fünf Jahren kennen.

translation.en: -It's just weird. You know what I mean? -You know what's weird, actually?
translation.de: -Es ist etwas schräg. -Weißt du, was schräg ist?

translation.en: I just found out... I probably shouldn't tell you this.
translation.de: Aber das sollte ich dir lieber nicht sagen.

translation.en: No, go, go, go. Come on.
-Is it going to fuck me up a little or no? -Uh...
Is it going to fuck me up a little, or no?
Be honest. Right now I feel pretty nervous.
translation.de: Sei ehrlich. Ich bin schon nervös.

translation.en: Is it going to fuck me up, or no?
I shou-- I'm not going to tell you.
Um... I actually am going to tell you.
So, I just found out that...
translation.de: Ich habe vor Kurzem erfahren, dass...

translation.en: -And it was pretty serious. -Wait, stop. Just so I get it in my head.
The guy who listens to music?
I mean, it was years ago.
You're not talking about the singer Sean Paul?
translation.de: Aber nicht der Sänger Sean Paul?

translation.en: -Uh... -Because Sean Paul is here too, somewhere.
translation.de: Sean Paul ist nämlich auch hier.

translation.en: Did not know that, but that's awesome.
That's insane. She never said it to me once.
translation.de: Das hat sie mir nicht gesagt.

translation.en: She's known that kid since they were little kids.
translation.de: Die kennen sich seit der Kindheit.

translation.en: It was a long time ago.
That's just what I heard. It was ages ago.
But, apparently it was pretty serious.
translation.de: Aber anscheinend war es ziemlich ernst.

translation.en: Everybody's dated a lot of things before they get--
Can you do me a favor?
You're my best man. I need you to do me a favor.
-Look me in the eyes. -I'm your best man?
No, I was gonna-- That's fine.
translation.de: Nein, ich wollte doch... Alles gut.

translation.en: When you meet him, you'll know.
I don't trust my fucking brother. Okay?
Sebastian is like... He's so... It...
He's always trying to impress people.
Who cares? You know what I mean?
But he can front flip from the top of the house
translation.de: Aber er kann Saltos vom Dach

translation.en: But you, I mean you're number seven out of seven.
You just got fucking ranked up.
I should have told you way before this.
I'm going to be honest with you.
It's because everybody else dropped out.
They didn't want to be best men. They wanted to get hammered.
They didn't want to think of a speech.
-Sure. -Okay, but can you do me a favor?
Just go to Short Paul and make sure he's not gonna do that weird thing
translation.de: Sorg dafür, dass Short Paul nichts Schräges macht

translation.en: where you snap out in the middle of the reception.
and you're like, "I say something mean."
The part of the wedding where the minister says,
"Does anybody want to say something mean?"
The part of the wedding where the minister says...
translation.de: Die Stelle, wenn der Pastor sagt...

translation.en: -I just want to make sure-- -I'm gonna--
I'm going to ask him if he's planning on saying anything mean.
translation.de: ob er etwas Fieses sagen will.

translation.en: I mean, that's cool. I'll do that.
Of course. I'm your best man now, so...
Listen, I know we've only known each other for three years.
translation.de: Wir kennen uns zwar erst seit drei Jahren.

translation.en: And I know at the beginning you were barely going to come.
translation.de: Fast hätten wir dich nicht eingeladen.

translation.en: You were the last person on our invite list.
translation.de: Du warst der Letzte auf der Liste.

translation.en: Like, I even told... I told Kathleen.
I was like, "I don't think so."
Just in case everybody else fucks you over,
you'll want a real dingbat to come in there."
Did she call me a dingbat?
Yeah, she called you a dingbat.
Yeah, I know. I want to do this.
There's a reason why we cosmically met at that place.
translation.de: Es gibt einen Grund, warum wir uns trafen.

translation.en: -You know what I mean? -Yeah, at the parking lot.
-Okay. I'm ready. I'm in it. -You were born for this.
Hey man, go do the thing. I've got to talk to my brother.
translation.de: Ich muss mit meinem Bruder reden.

translation.en: Hey, he could stay if he wants.
Uh... no! Uh... I've got some stuff to do.
translation.de: Nein! Ich muss noch was erledigen.

translation.en: Dude, so I just figured you haven't talked to me about it yet,
translation.de: Du hast zwar noch nichts gesagt, aber

translation.en: but probably I should get to my best man speech,
Let me tell you how it goes, and you could just give me notes.
translation.de: Hör sie dir an und sag, was du denkst.

translation.en: When I came out the doctor was like,
Anyway, I had a pretty good life.
Uh... I think about it a lot lately, and you know...
translation.de: Ich denke in letzter Zeit oft darüber nach.

translation.en: You know, one time I jumped off Mount Everest
translation.de: Einmal sprang ich vom Mount Everest

translation.en: two people are getting married, Boopity-bop, bippity-bam.
I drop the mic into champagne.
translation.de: Das Mikro fällt in den Schampus.

translation.en: I pick it up. I drink the champagne out of the mic...
translation.de: Ich trinke ihn aus dem Mikro...

translation.en: Throw the mic into the audience. Shit, is that a yo-yo?
translation.de: Werfe es ins Publikum wie ein Jo-Jo.

translation.en: I do five minutes of really cool stand-up.
translation.de: Ich mache fünf Minuten cooles Stand-up.

translation.en: I sing three of the most popular songs
you've ever heard of in your goddamn life.
-Okay? And then I put the mic-- -I told you,
-no copyrighted songs at the wedding. -It's fine. It's fine.
Is that cool? If so, I'm going to head out.
I mean, you could say all that stuff,
but, you know, on your own time.
-What do you mean on my own time? -Uh...
I'm your brother, man? What's going on?
-I know, you're my brother. -Talk to me.
I love you, you're my brother,
but instead of having you as my best man,
translation.de: aber du bist nicht mein Trauzeuge.

translation.en: I'm going to kick you down to number seven out of seven.
Okay, I'll say a joke now.
You are... You are 100 feet tall.
That's great. That's a funny joke.
But... yeah. No, we're not making jokes.
I don't think he has a name yet.
I just need Corey to step up to be best man. You know?
He and I have gotten real close over the past three years.
You're going to drink champagne out of the microphone?
translation.de: Du trinkst Champagner aus dem Mikrofon?

translation.en: People will go fucking crazy for it, man. You don't trust me. You never trusted me.
translation.de: Das kommt gut an. Aber du hast mir noch nie vertraut.

translation.en: But that makes the whole speech about you. It's my day. It's my wedding day.
translation.de: Die Rede handelt nur von dir. Aber das ist meine Hochzeit.

translation.en: You know, it's cool. I don't want to fuck you up on your wedding day.
translation.de: Klar. Ich will dir den Tag nicht versauen.

translation.en: Do I get to sit at the table with you guys at the dais, or no?
translation.de: Darf ich mit euch am Tisch sitzen?

translation.en: you want to sit at the table with me my new...
That kind of thing is just like me and her, though, you know?
translation.de: Da geht es nur um uns zwei.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'll go fucking wait in the parking lot.
translation.de: Ok, ich warte einfach auf dem Parkplatz.

translation.en: I've got a bow tie and a tie.
If I was your best man, I'd tell you you look stupid,
translation.de: Als Trauzeuge würde ich das dissen,

translation.en: This is how they're doing it.
Even if I'm not your best man,
I can fuckin'...I can help you out.
-I'm proud of you. -I'm proud of you too.
translation.de: -Ich bin stolz auf dich. -Und ich auf dich.

translation.en: You're two months sober, man. That's crazy.
translation.de: du bist zwei Monate nüchtern. Irre.

translation.en: It's even darker that I was going to drink champagne at the toast.
translation.de: Erst recht, weil ich Schampus trinken wollte.

translation.en: You know what? I'll just see you out there. Alright?
I don't know if you can see me. I won't be at the table.
translation.de: Oder nicht. Ich sitze nicht am Tisch.

translation.en: Yeah, I know what Sean Paul sounds like.
I'm Maid of Honor. I'm good.
Yeah, good to see you too. Uh...
Good to see you too... Marnie.
-Your name is Marnie. -I'm gonna do this.
I shouldn't have to wear... a dress.

translation.de: Jeder zieht an, was er will.

translation.en: No, I didn't come by myself.
I'm with Lisa, you know, but...
-Do you want me to stomp it? -I got it!
Anyhow, yeah, just, you know, outside...
-You know. -I know. I wanted to get some air.
-Have a smoke. -Everybody's going crazy in there.
It's kind of a nerve-wracking thing, I guess.
No, I'd love to get married.
She is... She is so funny.
Do you ever just want to go up nice and close
translation.de: Willst du ihr auch ganz nahekommen,

translation.en: You said go... I'm sorry, I must have misheard.
You said go up nice and close and...
You know, go up nice and close to her and...
get your mouth close to her mouth, and suck her breath out,
translation.de: Mund an Mund, ihr den Atem raussaugen.

translation.en: and now you have her breath in you...

translation.de: Das habe ich noch nie gehört.

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't know. In case we... -Yeah.
Probably... you know. I don't know.
I've never done that, but I didn't know...
Have you known her for some time?
I mean, I'm her maid of honor. I haven't heard her speak about you.
translation.de: Sie hat dich noch nie erwähnt.
Sie hat dich noch nie erwähnt.

translation.en: Well, Paul. Everyone calls me Short Paul.
translation.de: Paul. Alle nennen mich Short Paul.

translation.en: Paul. I think I've heard of Paul.
and she doesn't say short, she just says Paul?
I mean, it's just how these guys know me.
I think so. Have we said anything else?
I think we... said your name, but I can't remember.
translation.de: Ich glaube ja, aber ich weiß es nicht mehr.

translation.en: -My nickname is Amber. -I thought it was Lisa.
Your nick-- your nickname is Amber?
Your nickname is just another first name?
For this moment, it's easy for my nickname to be Amber.
translation.de: Jetzt gerade ist es einfacher so.

translation.en: -You want me to call you by your nickname? -Sure.
Hold on. We've got to figure this out.
I don't think there's much to figure out?
No, because then I don't know
if I know my girlfriend's name.
I was trying to make you look good.
Yeah. I didn't want to call you out
that you were calling me your girlfriend's name.
-No, no, no, but you have a name. -My name is Amber!
How do I forget my sister's name?
-I forgot that you said it. -So, hold on,
your parents named two daughters Marnie and Marnie?
And we can call that guy Dave if you want.
We got a lot of people hanging out here today.
translation.de: Wir haben heute viele Leute hier.

translation.en: Yeah, and we have so many more.
I am... That's why I'm nervous.
I'm actually... I have to say a speech today.
Yeah, and it's weird because I get emotional when I think about
my past and how we grew up together and stuff like that. You know?
Why? What happened in your past?
There's a thing that happened, right?
I don't think you want to know.
Even thinking about the past makes me realize how much I've grown
translation.de: Ich merke einfach, wie viel reifer ich jetzt bin.

translation.en: -and how much of my life is over. -That's crazy.
-Weddings scare me because of that. -I had something happen in my past too.
translation.de: -Darum machen Hochzeiten mir Angst. -Ich habe auch was.

translation.en: Do you want me to shuffle it?
Okay. Not a lot of people know this,
but me and Kathleen, we used to... [chuckles]
translation.de: aber ich und Kathleen waren mal...

translation.en: That's insane. I've known her for, like, 15 years.
translation.de: Was? Ich kenne sie seit 15 Jahren.

translation.en: I don't know how old that makes you.
-No, fourteen, you're at grade eight. -No, twelve.
Because that's when I went to a bunch of bar mitzvahs and bat mitzvahs.
translation.de: Mit 12 war ich auf zig Bar Mitzwas.

translation.en: I'd say sixth or seventh grade.
You guys went out? Did you...?
Sixth grade. Did you kiss or anything?
We made love under the moon.
-When you were in sixth grade? -For nights on end.
We couldn't get enough of each other.
I wrote a poem, she wrote me poems.
We got in trouble together, we ran from the law.
We thought about moving to Germany.
How long did this all last?
You know, the brightest suns burn the briefest.
translation.de: Die hellsten Sonnen brennen am kürzesten.

translation.en: There's just the one sun, we just have the one sun.
You are telling me that the entire universe has only one sun?
-That we know of. -Are you a flat-earther?
But I do think if I had slippery enough shoes,
and you took me to one part, I could slide all the way to the end.
translation.de: könnte ich von einem Ende zum anderen rutschen.

translation.en: Your theory on the world is that
if you had slippery enough shoes...
...you could fly from one end to the other.
I don't think the world is flat.
I don't think the Earth is flat.
And because it's round, if you get enough momentum...[chuckles]
translation.de: Darum kann man mit viel Schwung...

translation.en: I suppose if you had slippery enough shoes.
What happened? How did it end?
You already told me you made love in sixth grade.
We were in a taxi cab.
We had just seen... We had just... seen the opera...
translation.de: Wir waren in der Oper gewesen.

translation.en: I think I know what's going to happen. [laughs]
-Can I guess? -And a guy came out...
Did he try to steal her pearls?
He tried to steal the pearls.
Because that's not even all that embarrassing,
translation.de: Denn das ist nicht mal so peinlich.

translation.en: but then the guy with the clown mask slipped,
translation.de: Der Typ mit der Clownsmaske rutschte aus,

translation.en: and the gun went in the air,
and I tried to grab it.
the guy in the clown mask?
I don't know why you're looking at me like you're confused.
translation.de: Wieso siehst du mich so verwirrt an?

translation.en: -And you look like the fool. -And I had one moment
translation.de: -Und du siehst aus wie ein Idiot. -Und da

translation.en: to say a really cool line
translation.de: hätte ich was Cooles sagen können,

translation.en: And Kathleen, she looks to me like I'm crazy.
translation.de: Kathleen sieht mich an wie einen Irren.

translation.en: I don't want to kill the guy. Ah...
-This is crazy. -I've been to therapy every year
Is that why she didn't see you?
The police were like, "Yeah, self defense."
But, did you say something cool?
translation.de: Aber hast du was Cooles gesagt?

translation.en: -Like, "Get out of my life, clown." -"Oopsie, doopsies."
I said. "Oopsie, doopsies," and then the whole...
When I met Dave, the story that he tells even though he's like,
translation.de: Die Story, die Dave mir erzählt hat,

translation.en: "I don't want to tell it right now."
is that he saved her from a robber?
translation.de: er hat sie vor einem Räuber gerettet.

translation.en: They said they met when they were really young,
translation.de: Dass sie sich kennenlernten, als sie sehr jung waren,

translation.en: like seventh grade or something like that. Right?
translation.de: in der siebten Klasse oder so.

translation.en: And he said that he saved her from being robbed.
translation.de: Er hat sie vor einem Überfall gerettet.

translation.en: You ever have a time in your life
when you think you might come to a conclusion,
and then you think, "Maybe I'll just wait it out,"
translation.de: aber dann wartest du doch noch,

translation.en: and you're like, "No I'm definitely going to do it."
-I'll see you in a bit. Okay? -Okay.
And so the time has come...
Dave, if that is your real name,
translation.de: Dave, wenn du echt so heißt,

translation.en: and Kathleen, you will be mine.
translation.de: Und Kathleen, du wirst mir gehören.

translation.en: Okay, I'm, um, um, I'm ready.
Yeah. Is she coming? Is Kathleen coming?
Do I see her when we go down the aisle?
translation.de: Sehe ich sie bei der Trauung?

translation.en: Is the first time I see her right when this happens? When do I see her?
translation.de: Sehe ich sie da zum ersten Mal?

translation.en: You can't just say you're a ghost then disappear.
translation.de: Das kannst du nicht einfach sagen und verschwinden.

translation.en: We'll find out who you are later.
Corey! Hey man, I need my best man for a second.
I...I...I don't know... I don't...I don't...
You didn't get to talk to him at all?
No, no, I couldn't find him.
Just sit next to him if you see him,
and just make sure he's going to be fine
We're going down, but I don't know...
When does Kathleen come? When's the part where we walk down...?
translation.de: Wann kommt Kathleen? Wann geht es los?

translation.en: We announce you, then you come out.
translation.de: Wir sagen dich an, du kommst raus.

translation.en: And then we announce Kathleen, then she comes out.
translation.de: Dann sagen wir Kathleen an, sie kommt raus.

translation.en: I wish we had a handshake,
but we haven't known each other long enough.
Hey. Come on. Give it up.
-Come on, Dave! -I think you're supposed to be up there.
Yeah, I guess I'll be all the way in the back,
the last fucking person on the line.
Oh, oh! I won't make a big deal out of it.
I guess I'm their mom, then.
-Nice to meet you. [laughs] -Lovely to meet you.
I knew, I knew Dave would get married.
We knew it in the back of our minds.
I just want you to be loose, okay?
Don't tell me to loosen up when I'm already loose.
translation.de: Sagen Sie nicht, ich soll locker bleiben!

translation.en: -Harold! -Do you want me tight or loose?
Then don't 'aks' me to be loose.
translation.de: Dann sagen Sie nicht, dass ich locker sein soll.

translation.en: What do you want me to do? How do you want me to make you loose?
translation.de: Wie soll ich Sie dann auflockern?

translation.en: By not asking me to be loooooose! [shouting]
translation.de: Indem Sie nicht sagen, ich soll locker sein!

translation.en: I'm, I'm sorry, is everything okay? Are you okay?
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ist alles ok?

translation.en: I'm the father of the bride. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich bin der Vater der Braut.
Was machen Sie auf dieser Seite?

translation.en: -By the way, pleasure to meet you. -Lovely to meet you.
I feel like we should have met before at some point in time.
translation.de: Dass wir uns noch gar nicht kennen...

translation.en: Oh my God, it is so nice to meet you.
-It's so nice to meet you. -I'm, I'm the mother of the bride.
translation.de: Ich bin die Mutter der Braut.

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you too for the very first time.
Good, I'm fine. Are you okay?
Everybody's asking me if I'm loose.
translation.de: Alle fragen, ob ich locker bin.

translation.en: What about you? Are you loose?
I don't think you should... [laughing] ask a woman if--
translation.de: Man fragt eine Frau nicht, ob...

translation.en: -You were about to say it. Say it. -But I...
Say it. I've never heard the phrase before.
It's not something you ask a lady.
But I am loose as a caboose.
-We do like to have fun. -We have fun.
-We do like to have fun. -We're quite... We're...
We're half a bottle into a chardonnay.
translation.de: Wir haben eine halbe Flasche Weißwein intus.

translation.en: -Oh! That's so lovely. -Can I pour you--?
I would love some. Is that okay?
Here you go. Knocked that back pretty quick.
Well, okay, now I have your trash. Thank you.
translation.de: Ok, jetzt habe ich Ihren Müll. Danke.

translation.en: I'm ready if you want to play the trumpet.
I can't... I don't really know... many musical instruments.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht viele Instrumente spielen.

translation.en: That's fine. Just whatever you can do. Please.
translation.de: Alles gut. Tu, was du kannst.

translation.en: You're my maid of honor. Just do your thing.
What do they have in here?
-Marnie, come on, quick. -I know. I know.
-I've got to find something that I can-- -Everybody's waiting.
Agh, I just realized that it's so weird
that our parents aren't bringing us down the aisle. Keep going. Yeah.
translation.de: dass unsere Eltern uns nicht begleiten.

translation.en: If that side is the groom's side
translation.de: Wenn das die Seite des Bräutigams ist...

translation.en: -What? -We're all people from the music festival.
♪ Rock and rock and roll, roll, roll, roll ♪
translation.de: Rock and rock and roll, roll

translation.en: ♪ Pooh, rock and rock and roll, roll, roll, roll ♪
translation.de: Rock and rock and roll, roll
Wir haben uns heute hier versammelt...

translation.en: and the rock and roll enthusiasts...
We are both here under our own volition.
translation.de: Wir sind aus freiem Willen hier.

translation.en: I don't think this is part of the wedding ceremony.
Has this happened enough times where you have to ask this?
translation.de: Kommt das so oft vor, dass Sie fragen müssen?

translation.en: This is how I do it.
Mm... I wish I was fucking closer.
-I wish I was fucking closer. -Oh, yeah.
I wish I was fucking closer.
What do you want me to do? Be over there?
You gonna make me be a worm? Is that what turns into a butterfly?
translation.de: Jetzt soll ich ein Wurm sein? Wird ein Wurm zum Schmetterling?

translation.en: you're doing exactly what I didn't want you to do.
translation.de: genau das, was ich vermeiden wollte.

translation.en: When you tell someone not to do something,
you know, they're going to do it.
both of you are in love,
you have prepared your own vows.
before we get to those vows...
translation.de: bevor wir zu den Gelübden kommen...

translation.en: Does anybody have anything mean [chuckles] to say?
What the fuck is this? "Anybody have anything mean to say?"
translation.de: Was soll der Scheiß? Etwas Fieses?

translation.en: Um... okay, the short gentleman in the back.
What're you doing? You'll ruin the whole thing for them.
I got something mean to say.
This is my daughter's special day. Okay?
translation.de: Dieser Tag gehört meiner Tochter, ok?

translation.en: Well, if it's so special, why are you half... lit?
This whole time, all these years...
translation.de: Die ganze Zeit, all die Jahre,

translation.en: you've been telling everybody, her included.
What are you doing? Paul, what are you doing?
translation.de: Was soll das? Paul, was soll das?

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -That way back when in the alleyway,
when I stopped the clown robber,
it was you who stopped the clown robber.
Were you just taking credit just because I said "Whoopsie, doopsie?"
translation.de: Sagst du das, nur weil ich "wuppsi-duppsi" gesagt habe?

translation.en: You should stop talking right now. Okay?
You're embarrassing me. My parents are here.
translation.de: Du blamierst mich. Meine Eltern sind hier.

translation.en: My entire parking lot is here.
I got something mean to say?
Taking credit for other people's murders is not cool.
translation.de: Fremde Morde auf seine Kappe zu nehmen, ist uncool.

translation.en: Especially when the consequences are true love.
translation.de: Erst recht, wenn es zu wahrer Liebe führt.

translation.en: A love that I always had and will never know again.
translation.de: Eine Liebe, die ich nie wieder erleben werde.

translation.en: I didn't even want to come to this wedding.
Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me.
Sorry, the show's already started. You can't leave.
translation.de: Die Show hat begonnen. Du kannst nicht gehen.

translation.en: You got the bouncer from the music festival
translation.de: Ihr habt den Türsteher vom Musikfestival

translation.en: If you're the type of guy that steals other people's murders
and, consequently, steals other people's true loves...
are some kind of fucking...du-- dumbass.
He could have said the perfect thing and he blew it.
translation.de: Er hätte etwas Tolles sagen können.

translation.en: Why don't we let the lady decide.
You really think you had something with her?
translation.de: Denkst du echt, ihr hattet was?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, of course I did.
if something is said that's mean enough,
on the spot, the lady can decide.
I've been dating you since the seventh grade.
translation.de: Wir sind seit der 7. Klasse zusammen.

translation.en: Paul's been dating me since the sixth grade.
translation.de: Paul ist seit der 6. mit mir zusammen.

translation.en: I mean, not actively. We just had a moment.
translation.de: Nicht aktiv. Wir hatten unseren Moment.
Sag es ihnen. Sag es ihnen.

translation.en: Why is there a microphone being lowered? [chuckles] Um...
We did a little bit more than kiss.
translation.de: Wir haben uns nicht nur geküsst.

translation.en: Yeah. We made sweet, sweet love.
We made love every kind of way you could ever dream of.
We went to peep shows and got all excited
and then fucked on the dirty little...
I don't want to know anymore.
Look him in the eyes and choose.
Me or him. Just look him in the eyes and choose.
translation.de: Ich oder er. Schau ihn an und sag.

translation.en: Let me tell you something before you choose, okay?
translation.de: Aber vorher sage ich dir eins.

translation.en: I've... I've loved you since the moment I saw you.
translation.de: Seit ich dich zum ersten Mal sah.

translation.en: -That was right after we had sex. -Yes!
And I know he thinks he knows what love is, but I...
translation.de: Er denkt, er weiß, was Liebe ist, aber ich

translation.en: have felt it since the moment I saw you.
translation.de: liebe dich seit dem ersten Moment.

translation.en: And I'm telling you that I saved your life that day.
translation.de: Ich habe dir das Leben gerettet.

translation.en: So, if it's just some weird thing you have because he saved your life,
translation.de: Wenn du das machst, weil er dir das Leben gerettet hat,
Ich habe dir das Leben gerettet.

translation.en: you could actually prove that you did that?
translation.de: beweisen, dass du das getan hast?

translation.en: or is this just another figment of your imagination?
You were so creative as a sixth grader.
translation.de: Du warst kreativ in der 6. Klasse.

translation.en: You want me to prove that I actually murdered the guy?
translation.de: Soll ich beweisen, dass ich den Kerl ermordet habe?

translation.en: Is there any way you could do that?
I was the clown that day.
Yes, and I can tell you how it went down.
translation.de: Ja, und ich weiß, wie es geschah.

translation.en: I went to steal your... pearls
right in the alley after the opera.
translation.de: In der Gasse, nach der Oper.

translation.en: I was like, "Why are two sixth graders going to the opera?
translation.de: Ich so: "Sechstklässler in der Oper? Wieso?

translation.en: This will be an easy steal."
I snatch your pearls, they go all over the place.
translation.de: Ich greife die Perlen, sie landen überall.

translation.en: First of all, you look great tonight.
Thank you. I look great too.
translation.de: Danke. Ich sehe auch toll aus.

translation.en: I can't hear you. Say it again.
You didn't try to save the day.
My gun fell, you slipped, you hit me,
translation.de: Meine Waffe fiel runter, du hast mich geschlagen,

translation.en: And I'm being pretty cool about it.
translation.de: Und ich mache kein Ding draus.

translation.en: that the gun just went in the air and...
translation.de: die Pistole flog in die Luft und...

translation.en: and no one pulled the trigger other than it sort of falling,
-And that's how you died? -I'm telling you,
the only way you can make your decision is love
I'll still be the priest if you want.
translation.de: bin ich gerne wieder der Priester.

translation.en: I think you're going to want to hear this.
Um... you treated me real... nice, but real intense.
translation.de: Du hast mich gut behandelt, aber sehr intensiv.

translation.en: -We had a great time in sixth grade. -We had the best time.
translation.de: -Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit. -Die beste Zeit.

translation.en: I'm a woman now. A lady, even.
translation.de: Ich bin jetzt eine Frau. Eine Dame.

translation.en: And I think you got to let the past be the past, you know?
translation.de: Du musst die Vergangenheit ruhen lassen.

translation.en: You wanna fuck one more time?
Corey, dude, you were supposed to stop...
translation.de: Corey, Alter, du solltest Short Paul doch...

translation.en: -if he was going to do anything crazy. -Shit!
-I didn't do the one thing. -You had one thing to do,
Buddy, I got no other choice.
I've got to bump you to the back of the line.
No, come on, man. Is this for real?
-Is this is for real? -Of course, it's for real.
After we do our little thing here,
you want to do your routine?
-Can I stand right there? -Of course you can.
I love you too, baby, baby bro.
You've got to kiss each other.
Now, let's get down for the party.
I think my best man's got something to say.
translation.de: Mein Trauzeuge hat etwas zu sagen.

translation.en: my second-born has something to say.
Give me a beat. Give me a beat. Give me a beat.
I don't want to say a fancy speech.
Just want to say I love you both very much.
translation.de: Aber ich habe euch beide sehr lieb.

translation.en: And I can see why you guys fit perfectly together.
And I don't have to wish you luck because I know you'll be alright.
translation.de: Und ich muss euch nicht alles Gute wünschen, denn ihr schafft das.

translation.en: I love you, and I love you.
translation.de: Ich hab dich lieb und dich.

translation.en: No, somebody stop him. He's a robber.
translation.de: Haltet ihn auf! Er ist ein Räuber.

translation.en: -He's an actual robber. -I'm going to Heaven.
